Warning: The trunk version uses Python 3.

#summary Examples of usage
<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Yahoo! Weather =

==Script==

{{{
import pywapi
import pprint
pp = pprint.PrettyPrinter(indent=4)

result = pywapi.get_weather_from_yahoo('RSXX0199', 'metric')
pp.pprint(result)
}}}

==Result==

= Google Weather =

==Script==

{{{
import pywapi
import pprint
pp = pprint.PrettyPrinter(indent=4)

result = pywapi.get_weather_from_google('10001')
pp.pprint(result)
}}}


==Result==

= NOAA =

==Script==

{{{
import pywapi
import pprint
pp = pprint.PrettyPrinter(indent=4)

result = pywapi.get_weather_from_noaa('KJFK')
pp.pprint(result)
}}}

==Result==

= Countries from Google =

==Script==

{{{
import pywapi
import pprint
pp = pprint.PrettyPrinter(indent=4)

countries = pywapi.get_countries_from_google('en')

pp.pprint(countries)
}}}
